HOW TO USE 

Lawn Pre-cleaning 

First, draw a sketch of your cou�yard and mark the location of charging station, work area, passage, recharge path, and No-Go zone on the sketch for future reference. Clean up debris on the lawn, such as branches, toys, wires, stones, and other obstacles. Fill in the pits on the lawn and level the lawn. Before using the lawn mower, trim your lawn until the lawn height is ≤ 10 cm/4 in.
